A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Risky move\, however\, I love that they took many risks with the characters and the direction. Something that no one can say about this movie is \"It's a copy of previous SW movies\". On another note\, Adam Driver is great again\, Daisy it's again strong\, although her character doesn't receive as much attention as Driver's. Bold and risky choices with the old characters\, and a movie that opens up the lore beyond Skywalker's and Solos by sheer force. I understand the bad reviews based on False Expectations hard fans might have. The movie has flaws in the sub-plots. However\, it has been beautifully crafted\, great cinematography and opens up many avenues for the closing of the trilogy... However\, I really have concerns of how they can close out all in the latest\, we will see...
